item.title: By: YarnAddict
item.dc:creator: YarnAddict
item.description: Nice rings. I never considered anything other than a simple gold band. Had to have it taken out a few years ago. Had my engagement ring taken out too but I've but on more weight and refuse to have rings taken out more. Neither ring fits me right now but I'm wearing my Great Grandmothers wedding ring instead. I WILL loose weight so the rings fit me again.
item.content:encoded: Nice rings. I never considered anything other than a simple gold band. Had to have it taken out a few years ago. Had my engagement ring taken out too but I’ve but on more weight and refuse to have rings taken out more. Neither ring fits me right now but I’m wearing my Great Grandmothers wedding ring instead. I WILL loose weight so the rings fit me again.
